titleStmt.title: The painters voyage of Italy in which all the famous paintings of the most eminent masters are particularised, as they are preserved in the several cities of Italy ... / written originally in Italian by Giacomo Barri ... ; Englished by W.L. of Lincolns-Inne, Gent.
Viaggio pittoresco d'Italia. English
titleStmt.author: Barri, Giacomo, ca. 1630-ca. 1690.
Lodge, William, 1649-1689.

notesStmt.note: A rare and interesting little work, being an early guide to the works of art preserved in the churches of Italy.
Reproduction of original in University of Chicago Library.
